nodes.val: (h, w) = Get the height and width of the image matrix, denoted as h and w respectively.(input_grid)
output_grid = Create a new black image matrix of size (h+2) x (w+2), denoted as output_grid.(h, w)
output_grid = Overlay the input_grid onto the output_grid in an h*w sized area with (1,1) as the top left corner and (h,w) as the bottom right corner.(output_grid, input_grid, h, w)

output_grid = (4-1) Traverse the first row of the image matrix and perform the following operations for each pixel at coordinate (i,j): assign the color of pixel (i+1,j) to the current pixel (at coordinate (i,j)) in output_grid. (4-2) Traverse the last row of the image matrix and perform the following operations for each pixel at coordinate (i,j): assign the color of pixel (i-1,j) to the current pixel (at coordinate (i,j)) in output_grid. (4-3) Traverse the first column of the image matrix and perform the following operations for each pixel at coordinate (i,j): assign the color of pixel (i,j+1) to the current pixel (at coordinate (i,j)) in output_grid. (4-4) Traverse the last column of the image matrix and perform the following operations for each pixel at coordinate (i,j): assign the color of pixel (i,j-1) to the current pixel (at coordinate (i,j)) in output_grid.(output_grid, h, w)
